fields.name: ref_number
fields.title: Reference Number
fields.description: This field is populated by the organization. It is a unique reference number given to each line item in the spreadsheet. Having a unique identifier for each item will allow users locate a specific item in the registry should they need to modify or delete.

fields.name: disclosure_group
fields.title: Disclosure Group
fields.description: This field will display the group to which the individual belongs.

fields.name: title_en
fields.title: Title (English)
fields.description: This field will display, in English, the position title of the individual who incurred the hospitality expenses (the hospitality expenses were charged to their responsibility centre).

fields.name: name
fields.title: Name
fields.description: This field will display the name of the individual who incurred the hospitality expenses (the hospitality expenses were charged to their responsibility centre).

fields.name: description_en
fields.title: Purpose of hospitality activity (English)
fields.description: This will cover both the forms (for example, breakfast, refreshment, lunch, reception, dinner and other forms of hospitality) and circumstances (the purpose) of the hospitality, in English.

fields.name: start_date
fields.title: Start Date
fields.description: The start date on which the hospitality was provided.

fields.name: end_date
fields.title: End Date
fields.description: The end date on which the hospitality was provided. (can be the same as start date)

fields.name: location_en
fields.title: Municipality where the hospitality activity took place (English)
fields.description: Must include the Municipality where hospitality was provided, in English

fields.name: vendor_en
fields.title: Name of the first commercial establishment or vendor involved in the hospitality activity (English)
fields.description: Must include the name of the first commercial establishment or vendor that provided the hospitality (for example, restaurant, hotel or other location) and/or vendor (for example, a caterer), in English.

fields.name: vendor_2_en
fields.title: Name of the second commercial establishment or vendor involved in the hospitality activity (English)
fields.description: Must include the name of the second commercial establishment or vendor that provided the hospitality (for example, restaurant, hotel or other location) and/or vendor (for example, a caterer), in English.

fields.name: vendor_other_en
fields.title: Name of any other commercial establishments or vendors involved in the hospitality activity (English)
fields.description: Must include the names of any other commercial establishments or vendors that provided the hospitality (for example, restaurant, hotel or other location) and/or vendor (for example, a caterer), in English. Note, use the format {Vendor Name};{Vendor 2 Name} (e.g. Les Impertinentes;Les Street Monkeys)

fields.name: employee_attendees
fields.title: Attendees (Government of Canada Officials)
fields.description: The total number of attendees (Government of Canada Officials). For any clarification regarding Government of Canada Officials, please refer to Table 2 of the Guide to the Proactive Publication of Travel and Hospitality Expenses- Canada.ca (https://www.tbs-sct.canada.ca/pol/doc-eng.aspx?id=32660).

fields.name: total
fields.title: Total cost
fields.description: Total Amount of the expenses for the hospitality activity

fields.name: additional_comments_en
fields.title: Additional comments (English)
fields.description: This field may be populated with additional explanatory comments, in English.
